text: ohu (dinak itamat adambarayen yutuva) tama alamkarayat samaga tama janatava veta giyeya. (eya bælu ayagen) kavurun melova jivitayama (loku yayi) kæmættak dakvannan vasayen sitiyoda, ovun “karunta laba dun dæya men apatat (laba diya yutu) noveda? mandayat niyata vasayenma ohu imahat bhagyavantayeki” yayi pævasuha
